actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Army Corps of Engineers to provide certain technical assistance to local communities.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to survey the potential of and provide technical assistance for rehabilitating former industrial sites and millraces for use in developing hydroelectric facilities, at the request of local officials.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Army Corps of Engineers to provide certain technical assistance to local communities.
